name: Curious Creations
description:
These little fellas are my Curious Creations! Each individual piece is hand painted using spray paint, acrylic or enamel paint and finished in detail with inks.

The pieces are painted on good quality box canvases with a 35mm deep painted edge and are totally unique

The piece you receive may differ from the selection of paintings pictured but the overall design will be the same.  Specific colours and styles can be requested. Nine pieces shown in image are 15cm 15cm.

All work is © Copyright of John Curtis Art
 
Contact me for details.

Sizes are 15cm x 15cm, 20cm x 20cm and 30cm x 30cm

name: Bristol Themed Paintings
description:
These painting are inspired by the houses of Totterdown and Hotwells in Bristol, the colourful terraced houses can be seen from all over Bristol and are iconic to this city. 

Paintings are original and the medium is spray paint and inks on good quality box canvases, with deep 35mm painted edges, and are painted to order, therefore the one you receive will vary in colour than the one illustrated.

Specific colours and styles can be done on request and several sizes are available from 15x15cm to 30x30cm. Contact me for further details.

All work is © Copyright of John Curtis Art

name: Octo
description:
A new piece in acrylic, spray paint and ink on a good quality deep edged 25mm box canvas. 

This piece feature one of my Curious Creations "Octo" and is a unique original painting.

Size 80x30cm and is ready to hang. Please give Octo a good home!

All work is © Copyright of John Curtis Art

name: Tubes - Prints and Postcards
description:
A print of one of my black and white illustrations A3 size - Limited edition of 50 prints signed and numbered - ready to be framed.

This illustration was created several years ago using inks and has to be sen to be believed.

Will be sent rolled in a postal tube.

Also oversized and standard size postcards available at (Size 20cm x 15cm and 15cm x 10cm) 

All work is © Copyright of John Curtis Art

Original illustration still available on request.

name: Postcard Pack
description:
A pack of postcards or art cards featuring a selection of my work, each pack contains at least 20 postcards of illustrations and paintings from my portfolio.

The postcards make ideal gifts or look great framed.

All work is © Copyright of John Curtis Art
